name: Sonjia Serda
what_you_do: To provide collaborative counseling or coaching with purpose, care and experience so each person feels respected, empowered and learns new skills to be used throughout life's challenges.
who_you_serve: Individuals, families and couples with counseling and therapy needs.
social_proof: Seminary trained, National Board of Certified Counselors (NBCC), American Association Marriage & Family Therapy (AAMFT)
business_focus: Providing counseling and coaching services to help individuals, families and couples make positive changes in their lives.
